content.question: Which of the following aspects of Theodoraâ€™s behavior before and after the manuscript is mailed best illustrates her overall emotional state?

choices.label: She has no time to help Bertha with schoolwork before she mails the manuscript but enjoys helping after she mails it.
She pays no attention to Miss Brill before she mails the manuscript but realizes she is troubled by her after she mails it.
She is anxious about whether her work will be accepted both before and after she mails the manuscript.
She neglects her household duties both before and after she mails the manuscript.

content.answer: She neglects her household duties both before and after she mails the manuscript.
